org.greatage.util
Class ReflectionUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.greatage.util.ReflectionUtils

public abstract class ReflectionUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents utility methods for working with java reflection.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Ivan Khalopik

newInstance

public static <T> T newInstance(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                java.lang.Object... parameters)
Creates new instance of class using constructor with specified parameters.

Type Parameters:
T - new instance type
Parameters:
clazz - class to create new instance for (not null)
parameters - constructor parameters
Returns:
new instance of class or its implementation if interface

findConstructors

public static <T> java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Constructor<T>> findConstructors(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                                                                    java.lang.Class<?>... parameterTypes)
Searches for constructors for class with specified parameter types (null corresponds to any parameter type).

Type Parameters:
T - object type
Parameters:
clazz - object class
parameterTypes - parameter types, null corresponds to any type
Returns:
list of constructors for class with specified parameter types or empty list if no suitable constructors found

findException

public static <T extends java.lang.Throwable> T findException(java.lang.Throwable exception,
                                                              java.lang.Class<T> exceptionClass)
Finds exception with specified class in exception cause.

Type Parameters:
T - exception type
Parameters:
exception - exception with cause
exceptionClass - exception class
Returns:
exception with specified class retrieved from cause or null if not found

getClassesFromGenericType

public static java.lang.Class<?>[] getClassesFromGenericType(java.lang.reflect.Type genericType)
Gets classes from generic type.

Parameters:
genericType - generic type
Returns:
array of classes from generic type, not null
